basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Kyle. Before starting a software development learning path at Code Fellows Academy, I was in project management and sales enablement support for a fortune 500 company. Now, I'm a software developer currently working with newest front-end frameworks like React. I love to be surrounded with like minded critical thinkers and problem solvers to approach new challenges with tenacity and resilience, with a chance to create something that helps everyday people. My prior experience working with the direct public, high profile clientele, and cross functional orgs help to give me a deeper understanding of problem domains on a broader scope. Thanks for dropping by!

projects.title: Byte Size Adventurez
projects.description: First major production application using pure JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Fully conceptualized, built, polished, and deployed in 4 days with a team of 3 other software developer students. An app dedicated to pre-k kids and their parents to encourage STEAM learning in an ad-free environment. An amazing learning experience.

projects.title: Future 301 Project
projects.description: Here's a placeholder for the 301 final project of the Code Fellows 301, Intermediate Software Development, April 2023 class.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
